text: Peter Thomas King (born April 5, 1944) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative from New York between 1993 to 2021. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was seen a possible candidate for President of the United States in the 2016 election. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Peter T. King
